section.name: PicoDocs Maven Plugin
section.p: Plugin to generate PicoDocs by taking the zip archive of the Confluence docs (http://www.picocontainer.org) and massaging the the site to remove google ads and modifies links to point to the local reports in static html.

Plugin goals picodocs:generate and picodocs:deploy extend the Maven Site Plugin goals (http://maven.apache.org/reference/plugins/site/goals.html) by invoking picodocs:massage which massages the site zip archive.
Plugin looks for site zip archive in property maven.picodocs.site.zip which defaults to ${basedir}/picosite.zip. If not found, it does nothing more than execute the site goals.
